Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Impeccable service. Romantic venue in a top Amsterdam location. The food was excellent, but "wow" effect only a couple of dishes. It's more towards a 2stars price, with 1star only, but justified by the location. Only 4/5 because I really didn't enjoy the celeriac dish - yuzu miso, coffee and truffle is just too much an hazard imo.

Review Text:

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Amazing! The entourage, the perfect light, the right atmosphere, cozy and chique. The personal answered all our question with so much passion and kindness. The food was just amazing, every dish better then the one before.

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Very nice small place! Atmosphere is very romantic! Before dinner we also hade some cocktails in occo bar, they were very delicious. The food was great, very tasty and refreshing! Deserts was amazing very light, just perfect for quite long ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text:

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Compared with some restaurants who like garish presentation, Vinkeles focuses on food and taste more than others, and the beef from Gunma is incredible delicious!

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: I enjoyed my evening here with my family. The service is wonderful, the food is of good quality, though to me some seem to be mediocre, but that can be overlooked if you consider the atmosphere of the restaurant. To me, this is the THING ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Very overpriced: one star dining at two star prices. Quality was not exceptional enough to justify the price nor the exaggeratedly small portions. Pigeon dish was unique, venue was pleasant but overall an underwhelming experience.

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: We have just celebrated my friend‚Äôs birthday at Vinkeles and had a lovely evening. The staff were very welcoming and attended to us with friendliness without being overbearing. The food was fantastic and the dish combinations were inspired ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Beautiful and elegant location with a strong personality a good warm feeling. A well thought tasting menu with attentive selection of local ingredients with a Japanese touch. Dishes are very nicely presented and play very smartly with ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Such a cute place! The staff all speak really good English. We were served waters immediately upon sitting down with an extra glass bottle for re-fills, which was nice! The lattes were delicious, and we both really enjoyed our food and the cute environment. I had the chilli crab croissant, which was amazing

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Never had such amazing food. Didn't come cheap but the 7 course wine pairing was the best food experience we've ever had! Celebrating our engagement, the team really made us feel special, even offering to get us a taxi when we had finished enjoying!

Name: Vinkeles

Review Text: The decors and place is beautiful. I love the place. They have a great wine list, beautiful amachi and turbot as a main. Perfect service. Overall highly recommendable.

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: I‚Äôm spoiled. I admit it. I live in NYC and have access to some of the best restaurants in the world. I have to say this was one of the best dining experiences I have had in awhile. The Dylan Hotel is lovely. Situated in old town on a lovely ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: I have dined at the nicest restaurants in the world, and Vinkeles might take the top spot for overall experience. The service was impeccable. I am allergic to shellfish and the substituted the scallop for the foie gras, which was one of the best dishes I've ever had. The coffee service was amazing. Highly recommended.

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: A outstanding meal . Went with 5 course. And will say it was all top notch. The whole staff was #culinaryrockstar Service was üé© . I cant wait to my next trip to Amsterdam . To come back for more. Great work chef!

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Exceptional food, very friendly staff, accommodating   chef, very knowledgeable sommelier who was willing to share her expertise. Would have gone at least twice in one week, had my companion known what it means to be on vacation!

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Excellent service and amazing food

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: My wife and I and another couple did the five course tasting menu with wine pairing - this was one of the best meals I have ever experienced anywhere in the world. The Sommelier gave us an excellent pairing.

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: We had a dinner at Vinkeles restaurant with a couple of friends on Friday evening and went for a 7 course menu with accompanying wines. While the service provided by Ma√Ætre Casper was attentive and up to Michelin standards, the food ‚Ä¶

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Vinkles blew my mind. I spent the evening being made to feel like a total princess by the staff at Vinkles. I only wish I could have stayed longer. The food was wonderful and I thoroughly enjoyed the culinary journey they took us on. It was delightful!

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: The restaurant with very relaxed atmosphere but extremely tasty, delicious and refined food. However, the tables must be book in advance, like 3-6 months before the visit.

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: After many dinners aboard an AMA river cruise, this was a sumptuous, welcome change.  Outstanding food and service.  Quiet setting, for a meal that was an event.  All four of us agreed this was an Amsterdam highlight.  Bring $$$!

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Processional Sommelier presented the best wine paring I even experienced in other part of the world. Food ingredients are well combined together to make a complete new experience in food tasting. Chef' s menu with wine paring  is what I recommended to those food lovers. Cheers !

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: The food was really nice, and the chef was very friendly, but such a disappointment from the service. Especially one waitress was not so friendly and a bit agressive.

Review Text: Very nice people and it‚Äôs shame we couldn‚Äôt make it. But they cancel same day for free. I did had some cocktail and stuff was really nice.

Name: Vinkeles

Name: Vinkeles
Review Text: Amazing Restaurant! Everything from to the interior to the service was excellent. The menu and wines were exquisit and the service was the best I have seen in a restaurant.

Review Text: What a brilliant restaurant.Everything was just pefect.Maybe one minor detail, there should have been a bit more time between the dishes.But we would really love to go there again!!!
